宣礼人（MUEZZIN） 在穆斯林国家里，站在尖塔（MINARET）上或一个建筑的高处，召唤信徒去祷告的人。　　学院（ACADEMY）  …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: dialect variant of Arabic mu'aḏḏin, active participle of aḏḏana' 'proclaim'

entry.tran: (在伊斯兰教清真寺宣礼塔上按时召集信徒做祷告的)宣礼吏
entry.def: A muezzin is an official who calls from the tower of a mosque when it is time for Muslims to pray.

means.word_mean: 1. the Muslim official of a mosque who summons the faithful to prayer from a minaret five times a day
